channel.title: Help With Agility
channel.description:
Im working on my server and im now adding and fixing some skills. But im stuck with agility. I wanne do agility like real RS and not tele to the other side of the obstacle.
So my questions are: Do you have a working code for agility (with the emote's) ? Or Can u help me with making a code ? Or You know a minigame for agility (not fighting, something special) ?
What im doing now with agility:
| | ---------------------------- X² ---------------------------- X³ | | X²= me X³= im teled to there
What i want with agility:
| | ---------------------------- XXxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxXX ---------------------------- | | X= In and Out emote (not teleing to the end) x= crawling (crawling to the end)
Thx ;)

item.title: Help With Agility
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

And what is ForceWalk?
Can u give the code?

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Agility
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

Set the walking queue to the end of the obstacle, but change the walking anim.
What u mean whit that? Can u show me some code so i understand it? thx
Maybe there's an animation for it.

I’m not sure though.

There is animation…but im doing the animation on the place im standing.
Im not going in the obstacle.

Read full topic
